name: Sarah Leder
description: Sarah is an artist with using texture in paintings to showcase textures we find throughout our daily lives. She enjoys using multiple different types of mediums while creating.

name: Onion Runyon
description: Onion is an artist who enjoys using watercolor as her main medium for her pieces. Landscape and humor are her favorite variations.

name: Hilary Witt
description: Hilary creates expressive pieces using various painting mediums. She is inspired by her family and friends as part of her center stage.

name: Debby Cundiff
description: Debby Cundiff has been creating realistic portraits and landscapes for over 50 years.  She commonly uses oil paint, but has also done work in colored pencil.  Currently, she has been working in lapidairy and metal smithing.

name: Pamela Agrast
description: Pamela doesn't stay with one medium for long.  She loves to learn and explore different mediums and materials.  She commonly is inspired by nature and life events.

name: Jean Ver Hulst
description: Jean started doing watercolor during the 2019 Covid Pandemic.  It was the one medium her professional artist mother said she could never master.  Through videos and exploration, Jean has been budding in the world of watercolor.

name: Chantelle Berry
description: Chantelle has always been captivated by art in some way.  A couple years ago after a chain of events, she walked away from her daytime job to pursue a career in painting.  She specifically likes to express herself with the use of watercolor.

name: David Agrast
description: Covid brought about many hobbies for David.  One of them became bird watching, which soon became bird photography.  These small animals are hard to capture, but a treasure to find.

name: Halley Ween
description: Photography allows us to capture a small moment in time.  Halle loves to capture the sweet moments that nature offers; from flowers to glaciers.

name: Julian Agrast
description: Nature is ever changing and evolving.  Through images, Julian likes to capture the now in nature.

name: Ashley Smith
description: Ashley loves to play with color and texts.  Her inspiration growing up was the author and illustrator, Eric Carle, who layers paper to create unique backgrounds.  From recreation, Ashley grew to create her own style of art.

name: John Jacobs
description: Art has always been a powerful way for John to express himself.  After retiring from the military, he found solice from creating abstract art that gave him the freedom to defy boundaries.

name: Todd Jones
description: Todd spent his childhood going from art exhibit to art exhibit. He found he was found a connection with the artists who depicted real life events.  As he became a father, he started to capture his life through his art.

name: Claude Monet
description: Claude Monet was a founder of French impressionist painting, and the most consistent and prolific practitioner of the movement's philosophy of expressing one's perceptions before nature, especially as applied to plein-air landscape painting.

name: Vincent van Gogh
description: Vincent Willem van Gogh was a post-Impressionist painter of Dutch origin whose work, notable for its rough beauty, emotional honesty and bold color, had a far-reaching influence on 20th-century art.

name: Edouard Manet
description: Ã‰douard Manet was a French painter. One of the first 19th-century artists to approach modern and postmodern-life subjects, he was a pivotal figure in the transition from Realism to Impressionism.

name: Archer Greene
description: Archer paints from his photos he takes from his travels.  He found it was the best way to depict the images he sees in his life adventures.

name: Anita Subu
description: Anita learned to love art during her childhood travels to India.  She didn't have much to do on the airplane, but to draw.  As she grew older, she found other mediums even more interesting than the everyday crayon.

name: Roger Reed
description: Reed loves to look at all the colors and texture of a landscape.  He loves to explore the many colors in the sky to the textures of the vegetation
